sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
#app
    .buttona(v-if="show")
    .outlineDate {{ date }}
    .noteDaka {{ note }}
    .timeDaka {{ currentTime }}
    transition(name="button" mode="out-in")
        router-link.buttonDaka(v-if="!show" @click.native="show=!show" to="/dakaed" :style="{color: '#FFF'}") {{ button }}

</template>

<script>
export default {
  data: () => ({
            date: '',
            currentTime: '',
            note: '勇威，昨晚睡得好嗎？',
            show: false,
            button: '打卡'
  }), 
    methods: {
        updateCurrentTime() {
            var moment = require('moment'); 
            moment().format();
            this.currentTime = moment().format('HH:mm:ss');
            this.date = moment().format("YYYY-MM-DD ddd")
        },
        buttontr () {


        }

    },

    created() {
        setInterval(() => this.updateCurrentTime(), 1 * 1000);
    }
};
</script>

<style lang="sass">
// *
//     // border: solid 1px
//     position: relative
//     font-family: Times, 微軟正黑體
//     width: 100%
//     height: 100%
//     margin: 0

// body
//     background-color: #333333
//     //z-index: 1
//     position: relative
//     width: 100%
//     height: 100%

.router-link-active, .router-link
    text-decoration: none

    
.outlineDate
    width: 500px
    font-size: 20px
    display: inline-block
    float: left
    position: absolute
    color: #333
    text-align: center
    left: 50%
    margin-left: -250px
    font-family: Teko
    -webkit-text-stroke: 1px #fff
    font-weight: bold
    top:  28%




.buttona
    background-color: #A78E70
    position: absolute
    width: 100px
    height: 100px
    border-radius: 100%
    left: 50% 
    top: 50%
    margin-left: -50px 
    margin-top: -50px
    animation-name: big
    animation-duration: 0.6s
    -webkit-animation-fill-mode: forwards
    transform-origin: 0 50

@keyframes big
    0%
        // position: absolute
        // left: 50% 
        // top: 50%
        // margin-left: -50px 
        // margin-top: -50px
        // width: 100px
        // height: 100px
    100%
        position: absolute
        left: 20% 
        top: 50%
        margin-left: -50px 
        margin-top: -50px
        transform: scale(100,100)


.button-enter-active, .button-leave-active
    transition: 0.6s
.button-enter, .button-leave-to
    opacity: 0

</style>
